verses.verse: And the second <S%H8145><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, even for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was inside <S%H8432><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
And they had in their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> Beer <S%H884><s%>–sheba, or Sheba <S%H7652><s%>, and Moladah <S%H4137><s%>,
And Hazar <S%H2705><s%>–shual, and Balah <S%H1088><s%>, and Azem <S%H6107><s%>,
And Eltolad <S%H513><s%>, and Bethul <S%H1329><s%>, and Hormah <S%H2767><s%>,
And Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, and Beth <S%H1024><s%>–marcaboth, and Hazar <S%H2701><s%>–susah,
And Beth <S%H1034><s%>–lebaoth, and Sharuhen <S%H8287><s%>; thirteen <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages <S%H2691><s%>:
Ain <S%H5871><s%>, Remmon <S%H7417><s%>, and Ether <S%H6281><s%>, and Ashan <S%H6228><s%>; four <S%H702><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages <S%H2691><s%>:

And all the villages <S%H2691><s%> that were round about <S%H5439><s%> these cities <S%H5892><s%> to Baalath <S%H1192><s%>–beer, Ramath <S%H7414><s%> of the south <S%H5045><s%>. This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

Out of the portion <S%H2256><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>: for the part <S%H2506><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> was too much <S%H7227><s%> for them <S%H1121><s%>: therefore the sons of Simeon <S%H8095><s%> had their inheritance <S%H5157><s%> inside <S%H8432><s%> the inheritance of them <S%H5159><s%>.

And the third <S%H7992><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>: and the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was unto Sarid <S%H8301><s%>:

And their border <S%H1366><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> toward the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and Maralah <S%H4831><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to Dabbasheth <S%H1708><s%>, and reached <S%H6293><s%> to the river <S%H5158><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> Jokneam <S%H3362><s%>;

And turned <S%H7725><s%> from Sarid <S%H8301><s%> eastward <S%H6924><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> unto the border <S%H1366><s%> of Chisloth <S%H3696><s%>–tabor, and then goes out <S%H3318><s%> to Daberath <S%H1705><s%>, and goes up <S%H5927><s%> to Japhia <S%H3309><s%>,

And from there passes on along <S%H5674><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> to Gittah <S%H1662><s%>–hepher, to Ittah <S%H6278><s%>–kazin, and goes out <S%H3318><s%> to Remmon <S%H7417><s%>–methoar to Neah <S%H5269><s%>;

And the border <S%H1366><s%> turned around <S%H5437><s%> it on the north side <S%H6828><s%> to Hannathon <S%H2615><s%>: and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> there are in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Jiphthah <S%H3317><s%>–el:

And Kattath <S%H7005><s%>, and Nahallal <S%H5096><s%>, and Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, and Idalah <S%H3030><s%>, and Beth <S%H1035><s%>–lehem: twelve <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
And the fourth <S%H7243><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> to Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was toward Jezreel <S%H3157><s%>, and Chesulloth <S%H3694><s%>, and Shunem <S%H7766><s%>,
And Hapharaim <S%H2663><s%>, and Shion <S%H7866><s%>, and Anaharath <S%H588><s%>,
And Rabbith <S%H7245><s%>, and Kishion <S%H7191><s%>, and Abez <S%H77><s%>,
And Remeth <S%H7432><s%>, and En <S%H5873><s%>–gannim, and En <S%H5876><s%>–haddah, and Beth <S%H1048><s%>–pazzez;

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Tabor <S%H8396><s%>, and Shahazimah <S%H7831><s%>, and Beth <S%H1053><s%>–shemesh; and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> of their border <S%H1366><s%> were at Jordan <S%H3383><s%>: sixteen <S%H8337><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
And the fifth <S%H2549><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And their border <S%H1366><s%> was Helkath <S%H2520><s%>, and Hali <S%H2482><s%>, and Beten <S%H991><s%>, and Achshaph <S%H407><s%>,
And Alammelech <S%H487><s%>, and Amad <S%H6008><s%>, and Misheal <S%H4861><s%>; and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Carmel <S%H3760><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and to Shihor <S%H7884><s%>–libnath;

And turns <S%H7725><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%> to Beth <S%H1016><s%>–dagon, and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, and to the valley <S%H1516><s%> of Jiphthah <S%H3317><s%>–el toward the north side <S%H6828><s%> of Beth <S%H1025><s%>–emek, and Neiel <S%H5272><s%>, and goes out <S%H3318><s%> to Cabul <S%H3521><s%> on the left hand <S%H8040><s%>,
And Hebron <S%H5683><s%>, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%>, and Hammon <S%H2540><s%>, and Kanah <S%H7071><s%>, even unto great <S%H7227><s%> Zidon <S%H6721><s%>;

And then the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> to Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and to the strong <S%H4013><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> Tyre <S%H6865><s%>; and the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> to Hosah <S%H2621><s%>; and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> there are at the sea <S%H3220><s%> from the coast <S%H2256><s%> to Achzib <S%H392><s%>:
Ummah <S%H5981><s%> also <S%H663><s%>, and Aphek, and Rehob <S%H7340><s%>: twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

The sixth <S%H8345><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, even for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.

And their coast <S%H1366><s%> was from Heleph <S%H2501><s%>, from Allon <S%H438><s%> to Zaanannim <S%H6815><s%>, and Adami <S%H129><s%>, Nekeb <S%H5346><s%>, and Jabneel <S%H2995><s%>, unto Lakum <S%H3946><s%>; and the outgoings <S%H8444><s%> there were at Jordan <S%H3383><s%>:

And then the coast <S%H1366><s%> turns <S%H7725><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to Aznoth <S%H243><s%>–tabor, and goes out <S%H3318><s%> from there to Hukkok <S%H2712><s%>, and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> on the south side <S%H5045><s%>, and reaches <S%H6293><s%> to Asher <S%H836><s%> on the west side <S%H3220><s%>, and to Judah <S%H3063><s%> upon Jordan <S%H3383><s%> toward the sunrising <S%H4217><s%>.
And the fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are Ziddim <S%H6661><s%>, Zer <S%H6863><s%>, and Hammath <S%H2575><s%>, Rakkath <S%H7557><s%>, and Chinnereth <S%H3672><s%>,
And Adamah <S%H128><s%>, and Ramah <S%H7414><s%>, and Hazor <S%H2674><s%>,
And Kedesh <S%H6943><s%>, and Edrei <S%H154><s%>, and En <S%H5877><s%>–hazor,

And Iron <S%H3375><s%>, and Migdal <S%H4027><s%>–el, Horem <S%H2765><s%>, and Beth <S%H1043><s%>–anath, and Beth <S%H1053><s%>–shemesh; nineteen <S%H8672><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, the cities <S%H5892><s%> and their villages <S%H2691><s%>.
And the seventh <S%H7637><s%> lot <S%H1486><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> for the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>.
And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> was Zorah <S%H6881><s%>, and Eshtaol <S%H847><s%>, and Ir <S%H5905><s%>–shemesh,
And Shaalabbin <S%H8169><s%>, and Ajalon <S%H357><s%>, and Jethlah <S%H3494><s%>,
And Elon <S%H356><s%>, and Thimnathah <S%H8553><s%>, and Ekron <S%H6138><s%>,
And Eltekeh <S%H514><s%>, and Gibbethon <S%H1405><s%>, and Baalath <S%H1191><s%>,
And Jehud <S%H3055><s%>, and Bene <S%H1139><s%>–berak, and Gath <S%H1667><s%>–rimmon,
And Me <S%H4313><s%>–jarkon, and Rakkon <S%H7542><s%>, with the border <S%H1366><s%> before <S%H4136><s%> Japho <S%H3305><s%>.

And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> too little for them <S%H1121><s%>: therefore the sons of Dan <S%H1835><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against Leshem <S%H3959><s%>, and took <S%H3920><s%> it <S%H5221><s%>, and struck it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>, and possessed <S%H3423><s%> it <S%H3427><s%>, and lived in it <S%H7121><s%>, and called Leshem <S%H3959><s%>, Dan <S%H1835><s%>, after the name <S%H8034><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>.

This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, these cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages <S%H2691><s%>.

When they had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing the land <S%H776><s%> for inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by their coasts <S%H1367><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>:

According to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> him the city <S%H5892><s%> which he asked <S%H7592><s%>, even Timnath <S%H8556><s%>–serah in mountain <S%H2022><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%>: and he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, and lived in it <S%H3427><s%>.

These are the inheritances <S%H5159><s%>, which Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>, and the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, divided for an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> in Shiloh <S%H7887><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. So they made an end <S%H3615><s%> of dividing <S%H2505><s%> the country <S%H776><s%>.
